item.name: This API is to provide card bin details to Merchant and if this card can be used for disbursement on DDP Platform.

request.name: This API is to provide card bin details to Merchant and if this card can be used for disbursement on DDP Platform.

query.description: Conditional, required when information lookup for Sender. If not provided then it will default to Recipient

header.description: (Required) An API key is a string value passed by a client app to the API proxies. The key uniquely identifies the client app.
(Required) Epoch timestamp in the request initiating system

(Required) Contains a unique ID generated by the client that can be used for enforcing idempotency on POST actions. POSTs are inherently non-idempotent and submitting the exact same request multiple times would create duplicate resources. Note:- Omitting this header increases the risk of duplicate transactions.
(Required) An API key is a string value passed by a client app to the API proxies. The key uniquely identifies the client app.
(Required) Epoch timestamp in the request initiating system
(Required) Authorization information for the request. Format- `HMAC {hmacToken}`

(Required) Contains a unique ID generated by the client that can be used for enforcing idempotency on POST actions. POSTs are inherently non-idempotent and submitting the exact same request multiple times would create duplicate resources. Note:- Omitting this header increases the risk of duplicate transactions.
